name: Transform
description:
Freely manipulate your surroundings to solve a series of physics puzzles. As you progress, you are given more tools to control the environment.


WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Left/Right Click - Use tools

Q/E - Cycle between tools

1, 2, 3 - Tool hotkeys

R - Restart Level

N - Skip Level

P - Previous Level


Made in 48 hours for SGDC Game Jam VII

If the web player gives you problems, try the Windows download.

If you're having trouble with the puzzles, here's a full walkthrough of the game:

Music: Paper Mario 2 - Boggly Woods


This game was made in February 2016 for my 1 Game a Month challenge. Check out my Twitter to see a new game every month!
